name: TopSolid Project
summary: Learn about .TOPPRJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: By default, TOPPRJ files are stored within subdirectories of TopSolid's TopSolidPdm directory (which is created by default as C:/​TopSolidPdm/​). The software's user interface encapsulates access to all project files, so TOPPRJ files are not accessed directly by the user.
NOTE: TopSolid uses an embedded Microsoft SQL Server to store project documents and data.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
